title: Bitcoin treasury companies are ‘using gas pipes to fund your electric future’: Analyst

title: Aldi supermarket rival tries new way to end theft, shoplifting
summary: Retail theft and shoplifting have increased dramatically, and one chain has a new idea as to how to stop it.

title: 'Waste to energy' gas company files Chapter 11 bankruptcy

title: The United Steelworkers union condemns federal government interference in flight attendants’ bargaining rights

title: Liberals defend stepping in to end dispute between Air Canada and flight attendants
summary: OTTAWA — The federal Liberal government is defending its decision to intervene to resolve a labour dispute at Canada’s largest airline amid criticism from unions and opposition parties that the move sides with big business.
